article.title: Temporal evolution of the high-energy irradiation and water content of TRAPPIST-1 exoplanets

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the mass of TRAPPIST-1f as determined by Gillon et al. (2017)?
From Earth\'s perspective, in which direction are the TRAPPIST-1 planets moving at the time of the HST observations in Visit 4?
What does the lack of significant deviations from the mean flux in Figure 3 indicate about Visit 4?
choices: TRAPPIST-1c has a large hydrogen exosphere.
No variations caused by telescope breathing were detected.
TRAPPIST-1 Ly-a flux is stable over long periods.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which spectral bands show a significant increase in flux from Visit 1 to Visit 4?
According to the classical limit (Sp = 0.84 S), at what age does TRAPPIST-1g enter the Habitable Zone?
What is the mean estimated log10(LxUV/Lbol) for TRAPPIST-1?
Assuming an efficiency of 20% for photolysis, which TRAPPIST-1 planet has the highest amount of hydrogen available from photolysis at 8 Gyr?
